title: New: Shadow Shadow – 1000001
content: Over a year since Shadow Shadow appeared on the scene with the anthemic Riviera, Mattias Friberg, the brains behind the Scandinavian project, has returned with the cinematic, epic pop of 1000001, featuring vocals from Kicki Halmos. Set to be released in North America via new label Nonchalant, as a double A 7″, with Riviera on the flip side, it’s a stunning introduction to Shadow Shadow. It’s wistful, deeply moving synth pop at it’s very best. Check out 1000001 below, and remind yourself of Riviera underneath that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
